replies.author: wolski
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 wolski 于 2013-1-19 23:13 编辑 

http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-63718-1-1.html

用winRAR打开minecraft.jar，删掉META-INF，找对应版本的API，把里面的东西丢进去

replies.author: asd668898
replies.txt_content: 是把整个文件夹（zip）丢进去还是解压在丢进去

replies.author: cs2326989
replies.txt_content: 先把jar里的META-INF删掉，再放入FORGE，不要直接把FORGE直接放下去，就会打不开了。
